Subject: Generate the Report allowed Users for Devices from EPP Console
Description:
We would like to inquire about the possibility of creating a report from EPP regarding which users/computers have granular permissions.

To clarify, if one user has a permission to a device type that is not “Preserve Global Settings” or has specific rules that overrides that, we would like EPP to create a report so that we could audit and revise these permissions.
Solution_Comment__c: The issue was fixed/explained in RS
Account_Name__c: The Emirates Centre for Strategic Studies & Research
